testcase.name: Wrong Input Email
testcase.system-out: Given Initiate browser......................................................passed Given Navigate to Midtrans Demo homepage....................................passed When User click Buy Now button..............................................passed And Shopping Cart page is appear............................................passed And User fill Price Amount with "10000".....................................passed And User fill Name with "rozi"..............................................passed But User try to fill Email with invalid format "wrongemail.com".............passed And User click Checkout button..............................................passed Then Error Alert should be appear...........................................passed

testcase.name: Wrong Input Credit Card Details
testcase.system-out: Given Initiate browser......................................................passed Given Navigate to Midtrans Demo homepage....................................passed When User click Buy Now button..............................................passed And Shopping Cart page is appear............................................passed And User fill Price Amount with "10000".....................................passed And User fill Name with "rozi"..............................................passed And User fill Email with "rozi@email.com"...................................passed And User fill Phone Number with "08123456"..................................passed And user fill City with "jakarta"...........................................passed And User fill Address with "jl. sukses".....................................passed And User fill Postal Code with "12620"......................................passed And User click Checkout button..............................................passed And Order Summary page is appear............................................passed And Order Summary Amount must be same as Shopping Cart Amount...............passed And Shipping Details must be same as Customer Details.......................passed And User click Continue button..............................................passed And Payment Method List page is appear......................................passed And User choose Credit/Debit Card payment method............................passed And Credit Card Detail page is appear.......................................passed But User try to fill Credit Card number with wrong number "4962736475019283".passed And User try to fill Credit Card Expiry Date with wrong date "02/20"........passed And User try to fill Credit Card CVV with wrong cvv "12334".................passed Then Invalid Card Number Details Alert should be appear.....................passed And User can not click Pay Now button.......................................passed
